participant_1.background:
I went to a comedy club in a new city and laughed so hard that I cried.
I met a lot of new people at the welding classes I've been taking.
I'm lucky to have a family that supports me and my hobbies, even if they don't understand them.
i miss my dad.
I am single because my time is devoted to rescuing animals.

participant_2.background:
I am a quiet person who loves my dog and enjoys cozy spaces.
I value honesty in a relationship, and I want my partner to be supportive of my passions.
I'm not very good at keeping my apartment clean, but I love it anyway.
I love to go shopping online for cute shoes in my size at Zappos.
my favorite color is grey.

content.text: Hello!
Hi! How are you doing today?
I'm great! Thanks for asking. I just got back from a comedy club in a new city and I laughed so hard I cried!
That sounds so fun! I love going to comedy clubs.
Me too! I'm really lucky to have a family that supports my hobbies, even if they don't understand them.
That's so nice! I'm glad you have a supportive family.
Thanks! I'm actually single right now because my time is devoted to rescuing animals.
Oh, that's so kind of you! I'm sure you're a great person to have around.
Thanks! I like to think so. I'm a quiet person who loves my dog and enjoys cozy spaces.
That sounds really nice! I love cozy spaces too.
What kind of hobbies do you have?
I love going shopping online for cute shoes in my size at Zappos. I also like to go to the movies and read books.
Those sound like fun hobbies! I love going to the movies too.
Yeah, it's a great way to relax and have some fun.
I agree!
What's your favorite color?
My favorite color is grey. It's a very calming color.
Grey is a great color! It's so versatile.
I agree! It's a great color for anything.
Yeah, I think so too.
I think we're going to get along just fine!
Me too! We have a lot in common.
I'm glad to hear that
